1.text: Defrost the roast for up to 2 days in the refrigerator.

2.text: Remove the roast from the refrigerator an hour ahead of time.

3.text: Mix all ingredients besides the roast in a separate bowl.
3.vid: /1/16/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Rub the entire surface of the top round roast with the paste.

6.text: Place the roast in a roasting pan with the fat side up.
6.vid: /e/e5/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Multiply the weight of the roast by 21 minutes to find your cooking time.

8.text: Place the meat on a center rack in your oven.

9.text: Cook the roast in the oven for about 1 ¼ hours.

10.text: Use a thermometer to test the roast for a temperature of 135 °F (57 °C).
10.vid: /2/2f/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Take the roast out of the oven before it finishes cooking.

12.text: Tent the roast in foil and leave it on your counter.
12.vid: /e/ee/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Allow the roast to rest for 15 minutes before carving.

14.text: Cut the meat into thick slices against the grain.
14.vid: /c/c4/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Store leftovers in airtight containers in the refrigerator or freezer.
15.vid: /1/1c/Cook a Top Round Roast Step 15 Version 3.360p.mp4
